description: Eczema, particularly atopic dermatitis, is a skin condition characterized by itchiness and dryness. It can be influenced by both environmental and genetic factors.

recipes.instructions: Blend oats, mix with warm bath water, soak, then moisturize.
Mix honey and olive oil, apply to skin, leave for a period, then wash off.

description: Common condition characterized by smelly feet, known as bromodosis.
useful_tips: Avoid walking barefoot in public wet areas

ingredients: 1/3 cup of vinegar (white vinegar or apple cider vinegar)
recipes.instructions: Fill a foot basin with warm or cold water then Add 1/3 cup of white vinegar or apple cider vinegar , Soak your feet in the foot bath for 15 minutes (can be repeated multiple times a day if needed) then rinse and dry your feet. Rub a few drops of lavender oil on your feet especially between your toes. You can sprinkle some baking soda in your shoes to soak up the moisture and bad odor.(Caution: avoid soaking your feet in vinegar in case of having any open wounds or sores)

causes: Sweat accumulation leading to bacterial growth
Athlete's foot and other fungal infections

description: Darkening of the skin beneath both eyes.

recipes.instructions: Add boiling water to the tea bags in a cup Brew the tea bags for 5 – 10 minutes Take out the tea bags and put them in the refrigerator to cool then Gently place the tea bags over both eyes. Let them rest for 10-15 minutes then remove the tea bags and rinse the area with water. Repeat regularly.

description: Mild puffiness or swelling beneath the eyes.

recipes.instructions: Wash a fresh cold cucumber well then cut it into thin slices. Then Gently put two cucumber slices on both eyes and leave them on  until they warm up, then turn them over and leave them on until they warm up. Remove the slices and wash your face.

recipes.recipe_name: The Black or Green Tea Recipe
ingredients: 2 cold back tea or green tea bags
recipes.instructions: Add boiling water to the tea bags in a cup Brew the tea bags for 5 – 10 minutes Take out the tea bags and put them in the refrigerator to cool then Gently place the tea bags over both eyes. Let them rest for 10-15 minutes then remove the tea bags and rinse the area with water. Repeat regularly.

causes: Aging leading to muscle weakening and tissue deterioration around eyes
Fat movement to the lower eyelids

description: An inflammatory condition from oil and dead skin cells in hair follicles causing bacteria growth.

recipes.instructions: Brew teabag, cool, mix with honey, apply on face, rinse after 15 minutes.

recipes.name: The Honey Recipe
recipes.instructions: Mix honey and yogurt, apply on face, rinse after 15 minutes.

description: Common acne type, develops from sebum and dead skin cells clogging pores.

recipes.name: The Egg White Recipe
recipes.instructions: Mix egg white and honey, apply on face, rinse after 20 minutes.

recipes.name: The Tea Tree Oil Recipe
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, apply on face, gently massage, rinse off.

description: Small, flesh-colored papules on the skin, often found on oily areas of the face.
causes: Clogged pores due to oil and dead skin
Use of certain cosmetics or oils

recipes.name: The Lemon Juice Recipe
recipes.instructions: Dilute lemon juice with water, apply on face, rinse after 10 minutes.

recipes.name: The Baking Soda Recipe
recipes.instructions: Mix baking soda and water, apply as a mask, rinse after 15 minutes.

description: Hair loss is a common condition characterized by Progressive thinning of hair which occurs as people age. Some people experience circular bald patches on their beard eyebrows or scalp.
useful_tips: Protect hair from long exposure to sunlight

recipes.instructions: Blend onions and garlic, strain the juice, apply and massage the scalp, leave for 10 minutes, rinse with gentle shampoo.
Mix ingredients to form a paste, apply on bald patches overnight, wash with shampoo in the morning.

description: Dandruff is a chronic condition characterized by an excessive shedding of dead skin cells from the scalp.
useful_tips: Avoid using hot water to wash the hair
Eat diet rich in omega-3-fatty acids
Use antifungal shampoo day after day

recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, apply to scalp, message for 3 minutes, leave for 1 hour, wash with gentle shampoo and warm water.
Mix fenugreek, hibiscus, and milk, apply to hair and scalp, leave for 1 hour, rinse off with shampoo.

description: Split ends are caused by damage to the protein structure of the hair, leading to loss of mechanical strength from the cuticle to the cortex.
useful_tips: Avoid washing hair on daily basis
Avoid using heat on the ends of the hair
Use shampoo only on the scalp

recipes.instructions: Mash bananas, mix with egg, apply to hair, leave for 15-30 minutes, rinse off using gentle shampoo and warm water.
Separate egg yolk, beat yolk and mix with sunflower oil, apply to hair, leave for 30 minutes, wash with shampoo.

causes: Frequent exposure to water and chemicals
Long-term use of nail polish or acrylic nails
description: A condition where nails become easily breakable due to various factors.Almost everyone can have brittle nails. It is a frequent problem that results in split, thin, or weak nails. It may arise from an underlying condition like anemia or thyroid problems or from problems with moisture.
useful_tips: Avoid nail polish removers with acetone
Wear gloves during cleaning and gardening

recipes.instructions: Mix aloe vera gel and the olive oil in a clean bowl very well to form a serum. Chop the garlic clove in a chopping machine to form a paste. Rub the garlic paste to the nails, massage it in gentle circular motions and leave it for 10 minutes. Wash off and dry the nails. Now Apply the Serum onto the nails and massage it. Leave it for 2 hours or overnight for better results. Apply the Serum every night before bed and apply the garlic paste twice a week.

description: Discoloration or darkening of lips due to various external or internal factors.
useful_tips: Use lip balms with SPF 30 or above
Do not use low-quality lip cosmetics.

recipes.instructions: Mix and gently scrub lips twice a week.

causes: Allergic reaction to lip care products
description: Dry, cracked lips caused by various factors like weather or dehydration.
useful_tips: Apply lip balm throughout the day and before going to bed.

recipes.instructions: Mix honey and vitamin E, apply on lips, cover with shea butter, leave for 15 minutes.or overnight for better results. Remove it with a damp tissue or towel, Repeat it once a day.

causes: Consumption of certain foods and beverages (like coffee, tea, red wine)
description: Teeth discoloration is characterized by changes in the color of your teeth. It can occur as a result of various factors including diet, oral hygiene, and certain medications.
useful_tips: Limit consumption of staining foods and drinks

recipes.instructions: Mix activated charcoal powder with water to create a paste, apply on teeth, gently brush for 2 minutes, rinse thoroughly.
Rub the banana peel to get the inner content, add lemon juice and toothpaste, mix well, apply with a toothbrush, brush for 1-2 minutes, repeat 3-4 times a week.
